pages.text: Promissum was a primitive chordate, a conodont which had a primitive mouth under its eyes with tons of mineralized teeth. It looked like a small eel, having no fins except on the tail. Promissum was probably able to maintain a cruising speed.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
